name: Vishmi Bhagya
title: MERN Stack Developer
bio: A passionate MERN stack developer building reusable and open-source portfolio templates with modern technologies.
long bio: I’m Vishmi Bhagya, an aspiring data scientist and full-stack developer with a passion for blending creativity and technology to build impactful solutions. Skilled in Python, R, Java, Kotlin, and the MERN stack, I enjoy tackling challenges that require both analytical thinking and innovative design. My work is driven by a commitment to creating intuitive, user-friendly applications while continuously expanding my technical expertise. Outside of coding, I’m a cat lover and fitness enthusiast who values curiosity, adaptability, and the opportunity to contribute to projects that inspire and create positive change.

projects.title: Open Source Portfolio
projects.description: A clean, responsive, and customizable portfolio template built using the MERN stack, featuring JSON-driven configuration and Tailwind styling.

projects.title: Furniture Manufacturing & Retail System
projects.description: A comprehensive MERN stack application for managing furniture manufacturing processes, including inventory, orders, and production workflows.

projects.title: Travel App UI Design
projects.description: A sleek and modern UI design for a travel booking app, created using Figma, focusing on user-friendly navigation and appealing visuals.
